import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { loadedPosts = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit() {} onCreatePost(postData: { title: string; content: string }) { // Send Http request this.http.post( 'https://ng-complete-guide-7b384-default-rtdb.asia-southeast1.firebasedatabase.app/posts.json', postData ).subscribe(responseData => { console.log(responseData); }) console.log(postData); } onFetchPosts() { // Send Http request } onClearPosts() { // Send Http request } }
